SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.math

Class DecimalMath

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.DecimalMath
public class DecimalMath extends Object
Math utilities which use BigDecimal.

All runtime calculations which involve rounding use the mathematical context RUNTIME_CONTEXT, while all constants precomputed at compile time use the COMPILE_CONTEXT.

Both mathematical contexts are determined by the constant RUNTIME_PRECISION. A margin of two more decimal places is added to this precision for compile time calculations.
